net.openhft.chronicle.bytes

Interface ByteStringAppender<B extends ByteStringAppender<B>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Appendable, StreamingDataOutput<B>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Bytes<Underlying>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBytes, MappedBytes, NativeBytes, SubBytes, SubZeroedBytes, VanillaBytes, ZeroedBytes

    public interface ByteStringAppender<B extends ByteStringAppender<B>>
extends StreamingDataOutput<B>, Appendable

      throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Obtain the underlying address. This is for expert users only.
        Returns:

        Throws:
